content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I feel so shy when I try to express my feelings in front of my boss.
I am so sorry to hear that. Is it a result of conflict? Or can you please explain more specifically?
I hate being refused and denied, so I don't dare to say it aloud.
I understand that feeling, I would not dare to say it aloud! Do you feel as though it is being denied or rejected?
